title: MR negative, less output will grow monopoly profit

content.question: Which of the following is always true of a monopoly that is producing a level of output such that marginal revenue is negative?

choices.label: It is experiencing economies of scale in production.
It is producing where demand is price elastic.
It could lower price to increase profits.
It could decrease output to increase profits.

content.answer: It could decrease output to increase profits.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
